events.article_title: Watch and 100% Win Airdrops: November Rate Cuts and U.S. Elections Approaching: How to Position $BTC and $ETH?
events.event_summary: GateLive will host a live program called Trading Signals on October 18th at 12:00 (UTC), featuring discussions on how November rate cuts and the U.S. elections will affect $BTC and $ETH. Participants can claim red packets and interact with guests for a chance to receive $5 Gate.io points.
events.user_action_required: Book the live stream and participate to claim free airdrops and rewards.
quantifiable_changes: Points reward: Points (valid for 15 days) can be used to offset spot and futures trading fees.

events.article_title: Gate.io Supports Frontier (FRONT) to Self Chain (SLF) Token Migration
events.event_summary: Gate.io is facilitating the migration of Frontier (FRONT) tokens to Self Chain (SLF) at a 1:1 ratio. The migration involves disabling certain services and automatic settlement of positions. The total token supply will increase from 90 million to 360 million. Gate.io will no longer support FRONT tokens after the migration.
events.user_action_required: Users should adjust their trading strategies and close positions before the specified deadlines to avoid automatic settlement. Users with assets in Simple Earn or outstanding loans should redeem or repay them in advance.
quantifiable_changes: Total token supply increases from 90 million to 360 million
